description: Business Analysts for Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement: Business Analysts for CMHC

### Solicitation Number
RFx002902

### Publication Date
June 13, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
July 8, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

### Related Documents
Please find the complete solicitation documents available for download at [Canada Buys Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

### Procurement Overview
This procurement is for the provision of Business Analyst services by qualified suppliers to the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) under the TBIPS (Technology Branch Information Technology Professional Services) contract.

### Scope of Work
The selected suppliers will provide expert-level Business Analyst services to support the delivery of CMHC's business initiatives and projects. This will include providing technical expertise, developing business cases, and supporting the implementation of new business processes.

### Eligibility Requirements
This tender is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders who are qualified under Tier 1, the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise for the following category:

* Workstream 4 – Business Services: Business Analyst Senior (Qty 2) and Business Analyst Senior (Qty 3)

### Evaluation Criteria

* Technical Merit (40%): Evaluation will be based on the supplier's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.
* Price (40%): Evaluation will be based on the most advantageous price for the services described in the solicitation document.
* Past Performance (20%): Evaluation will be based on the supplier's past performance in delivering similar services.

### Selection Criteria
The selected supplier(s) will be awarded a contract based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Contract Term
The proposed contract will commence on August 1, 2024, and is expected to end on July 31, 2027.

### Contact Information
For further information or clarification, please contact:

Christine Brown, Contract Officer
Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON K1L 8K5
 Email: [ccbrown@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:ccbrown@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)
 Telephone: (613) 748-2534

Note: This rewritten text is rewritten to remove repetitive data, unclear information, and excessive paragraphs. The tone is formal and professional, and the formatting is clean and simple. The information provided is concise and relevant to the procurement.
